How to improve your social skills:
1 learn people's names 2 interrupt less 3 listen with intent to learn 4 promote others good work 5 hold doors open longer 6 say please and thank you 7 give without expecting a get 8 don't respond to negativity 9 don't nitpick 10 be optimistic
